question: Which of the following port was the centre of trade in luxury commodities during the rule of the Vijayanagar kingdom?
explanation: Through the port of Malabar, the Vijayanagar rulers imported high-quality horses from Arabia and other Gulf countries. The port of Malabar was also the centre of trade in luxury commodities. TheÂ  Vijayanagar rulers always attempted to control the port of Malabar.
